Do you want to sit around and wait? going into fixed income and gold comes with a certain risk too. For example, gold price is purely determine by supply and demand. How do you know if you enter at the right price? You can try less risky products like Singapore Savings Bonds or if you are paying tax, how about reducing your tax by topping up CPF under Retirement Sum Top-Up (RSTU)?
